Dear All , Good day !
Pls pps suitable biz for our lady and add yb@fz-highton.com in your address book，and pls contact me on WeChat(+86-13763800938) or skype(id:13763800938@126.com)
MV XIN HAI TONG 37 (SCRUBBER  FITTED) 2012 56500DWT 4X35MT CRANE WL OPEN LAGOS, NG 10-18TH/SEP 2024 IAGW WP.
BOD: HSFO ABT 750-850MT . MGO ABT 90-130 MT.
LAST 5 CGO : GENERAL CGO/COAL/WHEAT/GENERAL CGO/SPODUMENE
TRY ANY
VSL NAME: XIN HAI TONG 37
IMO: 9594597
Call Sign:   V7WL2
Built : Jiangsu Hantong Ship Heavy Industries Co. Ltd. CHINA
Delivery from shipyard: 12 JUN. 2012
Flag : Marshall Island
Class : BUREAU VERITAS
DWT/Draft:  about 56,539 MT DWT / 12.8 m SSW
GRT/NRT:33114/19227 MT
TPC : 58.8MT at full summer draft
CONSTANT: 500MT
OUTREACH:11.87 m from shipside.
LOA/Beam : 189.99 m (loa) / 32.25 m (beam)
LBP : 184.97m
Depth moulded : 18 m
Managers:  Daqin International Ship Management Co., Ltd
Suez : 34281.31GT / 30605.47 NT
Panama :27447mt NT
Tropical salt :58112 MT / 13.067m
Summer salt : 56,539 MT DWT / 12.8m SSW
Winter salt : 54,968  MT / 12.533m
Ho/Ha : 5/5
Hatch size :
no.1 : 18.86m x 18.26 m
no.2 : 21.32 m X 18.26 m
no.3 : 21.32 m X 18.26 m
no.4 : 21.32 m X 18.26 m
no.5 : 21.32 m X 18.26 m
Hold capacity :
no.1/2/3/4/5 : 13009.86 /15333.25/14553.08/15333.27/13404.64 cbm
Grain: 71632.0 CBM
Main deck strength (MT/m2): 2.3mt/m2
Hatch cover strength(design wave load) :No.(1-5)  2.3mt/m2 not for cargo
Tank top strength (MT/m2) :No.(1-3-5)   25.00mt/m2   No.(2-4)   20.00mt/m2
Strengthened for heavy cargo
Lightship weight :  11218.6MT
Constants : 500MT (excl. freshwater)
Gears : cranes: 4 x 35mt (hook mode)
4 x 28mt (grab mode)
grabs: 4 x (15 cbm,adjustable)
ECO speed/cons:
B ABT 12.0K ON ABT 22.0MT/DAY IFO + ABT 0.2 MT/DAY MDO
L ABT 11.5K ON ABT 23.0MT/DAY IFO + ABT 0.2 MT/DAY MDO
IN PORT :
IDLE: ABT 2.5MT LSMGO PER DAY
GEAR WORKING: ABT 5.0MT LSMGO PER DAY
FOR EVERY BALLAST/DEBALLAST/EXCHANGE OF BALLAST OPERATION (EXCLUDING BWTS) ADDITIONAL : ABT 2.2MT/DAY LSMGO
HOLDS CLEANING ADDITIONAL: ABT 2.2MT/DAY LSMGO
ADDITIONAL 1.5 MT LSMGO DAILY FOR BOILER CONSUMPTION WITH TEMPERATURE LESS THAN 10 DEGREE CENTIGRADE.
(A) AVERAGE SPEED AND AVERAGE CONSUMPTION TO BE CALCULATED FROM SEA BUOY TO SEA BUOY EXCLUDING PERIODS OF SLOW STEAMING
ON CHARTERERS ORDER OR FOR REASONS OF SAFETY OR STANDING BY OR ASSISTING ANOTHER VESSEL IN DISTRESS.
(B) SPEED AND CONSUMPTION BASIS GOOD WEATHER CONDITIONS OF UP TO BEAUFORT FORCE 4 AND DOUGLAS SEA STATE 3 (SIGNIFICANT HEIGHT MAX 1.25M)WITH NO NEGATIVE SWELL NO ADVERSE CURRENTS, MINIMUM 24 HOURS STEAMING TIME, EXTRAPOLATION OF “GOOD WEATHER” PERFORMANCE FOR “BAD WE ATHER” PERIODS IS NOT ALLOWED.
(C) THE EFFECTS OF CURRENTS DURING PERIODS OF GOOD WEATHER ARE TO BE EXPRESSLY EXCLUDED FROM THE PERFORMANCE ASSESSMENT.
(D)VESL MAY BURN SMALL QTYS OF LSMGO WHEN MANEUVERING IN SHALLOW&NARROW WATERS ENTERING/LEAVING PORTS/IN HEAVY WEATHER/CANAL/RIVER/BALLAST/DEBALLAST ETC.
(E) 0.5 KNOT ALLOWANCE  TO BE APPLIED FOR SPEED ASSESSMENT, 5% ALLOWANCE FOR OWNER TO BE APPLIED TO BUNKER CONSUMPTION.
(F) BUNKER SAVING TO OFFSET ANY TIME LOST AND VICE VERSA.
(G) BUNKER SUPPLIED BEING OF ISO8217:2017 (E)  SPECIFICATION, OR 2010, IF 2017 IS NOT AVAILABLE
Tks n B.rgs
Stefan Yan
yb@fz-highton.com
Mob:+86-13763800938(wechat)
Skype:13763800938@126.com
HAI DONG INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING COMPANY LIMITED AS AGENT OF OWNER
10TH FLOOR A2, CANGSHAN WANDA PLAZA,FUZHOU, FUJIAN,CHINA
